body_html:
@zasdfgbnm can you clarify a bit more about the purpose of what you are doing here?

1bd3bfa#diff-04aeac3b8c8dc82fda795b4f8da66489R191 is already setting some options for -O, and 'opt' is passed to the nvcc command line; and we figured it would apply to both the host compiler and nvcc compiler options. Can you help us out and let us know what specifically is not working as intended, and maybe why too?

Can you help us out and let us know what specifically is not working as intended, and maybe why too?
body:
@zasdfgbnm can you clarify a bit more about the purpose of what you are doing here?

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/10999/commits/1bd3bfa8bd9a10c6431d106799d4bada849006fb#diff-04aeac3b8c8dc82fda795b4f8da66489R191 is already setting some options for -O, and 'opt' is passed to the nvcc command line; and we figured it would apply to both the host compiler and nvcc compiler options.  Can you help us out and let us know what specifically is not working as intended, and maybe why too?
